title: Term Tender for a Combined Cargo of Petroleum Products
decision_details: -  the proposal made by Hon. Susil Premajayantha, Minister of Petroleum Industries, on the basis of the recommendation of the Special Standing Cabinet Appointed Procurement Committee to enter into a term contract agreement with M/s. Petrochina International (Singapore) Pte. Limited, Singapore, for supply of petroleum products for a period of six months from 2012?12?01 to 2013?05?31, on stipulated conditions, was approved by the Cabinet.
